input.options: date day of week hour minute second year time in miliseconds full date

block.l: let miliseconds = parseInt(dateValue); if (!isNaN(miliseconds)) { dateValue = miliseconds; } var theDate = new Date(dateValue); switch(outFormat) { case "unix": case "miliseconds": case "time in miliseconds": return theDate.getTime(); case "date": return theDate.getDate(); case "day of week": return theDate.getDay(); case "month": return theDate.getMonth(); case "hour": return theDate.getHours(); case "minute": return theDate.getMinutes(); case "year": return theDate.getFullYear(); case "second": return theDate.getSeconds(); case "month": return theDate.getMonth(); case "clock": case "time": return theDate.toTimeString(); case "full date": return theDate.toDateString(); case "string": return theDate.toString(); case "isoString": return theDate.toISOString(); default: return "Select a valid output format." }
